abstract: New York City Council speaker Christine C Quinn reminds voters that she has been arrested in past for civil disobedience, as have other prospective mayoral candidates Bill de Blaso and Scott M Stringer; comment touches on Occupy Wall Street demonstrations, which have set off national conversation about protests and social change.
snippet: Christine C. Quinn noted in connection with Occupy Wall Street that she had been arrested, as have two other Democrats who may run for mayor in 2013.
lead_paragraph: Christine C. Quinn noted in connection with Occupy Wall Street that she had been arrested, as have two other Democrats who may run for mayor in 2013.

headline.main: A City Where Campaign Posters Can Promote Past Arrests
headline.print_headline: Where Campaign Posters Can Promote Past Arrests
headline.seo: In Race for New York Mayor, Arrest Records to Promote
